feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from philipdefranco

entry.title: Pakistan Stands Up For Canada Amid Diplomatic Battle With India #canada #india #pakistan India is warning its citizens traveling to Canada or living in Canada to exercise the utmost caution. They issued this warning in light of what they call “anti-India
entry.content: Pakistan Stands Up For Canada Amid Diplomatic Battle With India #canada #india #pakistan India is warning its citizens traveling to Canada or living in Canada to exercise the utmost caution. They issued this warning in light of what they call “anti-India activities and politically-condoned hate crimes and criminal violence in Canada”. Adding that any Indians who oppose the “anti-India agenda” in Canada face threats. India, who murdered a Canadian citizen, continues to play the victim. The investigation that caught India was initially thought to be headed by the CIA and Canada, but a western intelligence official dropped a not-so-subtle hint that all of 5 eyes has been investigating the murder. Pakistan has something to say about all of this though, saying “India's terrorism in Canada is not a matter of surprise” Adding “If anyone in the world is aware of Indian terrorism, it is us” Yesterday they said India was a “terrorist and rogue state”, and asked "how long will our friends in the West continue to ignore such acts from India?”

entry.title: Saudi Arabia To Built A Nuke If Iran Gets One #usa #saudiarabia Saudi Arabia said in no uncertain terms that if Iran gets a nuclear weapon then they have to get one too. The U.S.’ biggest fear regarding a nuclear Iran has less to do with Iran having a nu
entry.content: Saudi Arabia To Built A Nuke If Iran Gets One #usa #saudiarabia Saudi Arabia said in no uncertain terms that if Iran gets a nuclear weapon then they have to get one too. The U.S.’ biggest fear regarding a nuclear Iran has less to do with Iran having a nuke but the proliferation it’ll bring to the region. As Saudi Arabia is clearly stating here they’ll build nukes, one should expect Turkey to also build nukes if Saudi gets them. A nuclear arms race in the Middle East gives the U.S. all the more reason to strike a deal with Iran.

entry.title: India Says Quebec Should Be Free #canada #india India says it should have a referendum on Quebec’s independence from Canada. Also saying that Canada’s reputation is now being a “safe haven for terror”. This comes as India has suspended visa services for
entry.content: India Says Quebec Should Be Free #canada #india India says it should have a referendum on Quebec’s independence from Canada. Also saying that Canada’s reputation is now being a “safe haven for terror”. This comes as India has suspended visa services for Canadians and has demanded that Canada reduce the amount of staff in it’s embassy in India. Saying that Canada has interfered in their domestic affairs… which actually kind of seems like admission of guilt. India continues to deny the accusation but Canada has rejected India’s denial and is urging India to cooperate in the investigation.

entry.title: America abandons Canada #usa #canada American has abandoned Canada. India has reportedly reached out to the US to offer to cooperate with Canada if they release the evidence publicly. It’s unclear why India didn’t just tell Canada this directly but it’s
entry.content: America abandons Canada #usa #canada American has abandoned Canada. India has reportedly reached out to the US to offer to cooperate with Canada if they release the evidence publicly. It’s unclear why India didn’t just tell Canada this directly but it’s possible that the Indian government is just lying and is assuming the US won’t involve itself. India is having a full scale meltdown and is throwing gasoline on this fire, making themselves look more guilty in the process as Canada continues to wonder why the US and UK, who helped indict India, are staying silent. As one Canadian in our comments put it “America loves this kind of thing. They love to stick up for the little guy & raise hell but not when it comes to us I guess. Maybe China would be a more dependable ally.”

entry.title: Canada Has India Dead To Rights #canada #india #usa Canada has India dead to rights in the murder of a Canadian citizen. The Canadian government & an unidentified Five Eyes member reportedly amassed tons of intelligence on India including communications
entry.content: Canada Has India Dead To Rights #canada #india #usa Canada has India dead to rights in the murder of a Canadian citizen. The Canadian government & an unidentified Five Eyes member reportedly amassed tons of intelligence on India including communications involving Indian officials themselves, including Indian diplomats present in Canada. This reportedly includes texts and recorded calls. Also Canadian officials say that when pressed behind closed doors, no Indian official has denied the bombshell allegation. The US now says that India will not get a free pass after public pressure mounted over the US’ initially staying silent over the row. President Biden reportedly raised the issue with Modi at the G20 which means that the evidence that India murdered a Canadian is rock solid enough for the President of the United States to take action on it.
